thread.title: Judge Neil Gorsuch Promises Senators He Will Uphold the Constitution as Written
thread.title_full: Judge Neil Gorsuch Promises Senators He Will Uphold the Constitution as Written

author: Ken Klukowski
title: Judge Neil Gorsuch Promises Senators He Will Uphold the Constitution as Written
text: Judge Neil Gorsuch gave his opening statement to the Senate Judiciary Committee Monday on the first day of hearings on his nomination to the U.S. Supreme Court. In it he unpacked his views on the job of unelected judges in a democratic republic, giving his personal story and pledging to be a public servant who faithfully follows the Constitution and the laws enacted by the peopleâ€™s elected representatives.
